productName: Koller Products 3 Gallon Tropical 360 View Aquarium Starter Kit

productDesc: Introducing the Imagitarium Freshwater Aquarium, a sleek desktop fish tank crafted from shatter-proof acrylic. This aquarium features versatile day/night LED lighting in both blue and white hues for optimal viewing. With internal filtration built in, maintaining a healthy environment for your aquatic friends is effortless. The convenient lid design allows for easy access during feeding times. Plus, it comes equipped with a C filter cartridge and is compatible with Imagitarium Replacement Small C Filter Cartridge Pads, ensuring long-term convenience and functionality
